channel.title: How do you make a link?
channel.description:
Yeah.. wrong section maybe? but i didn't really know what section to put it in..
Just wondering how you made a link say something, such as..
make [url=http://www.youtube.com]www.youtube.com[/url] say something like "here" or "click me" and take you to youtube..
Help would be GREATLY appreciated.
Slypk.
